name: Wrong Fork, Tony Hawk!
description:
Hey, uh... I'm really nervous...

Your best friend and legendary skateboarder Tony Hawk has been invited to a fancy dinner party, and he's brought you along to help him out! Make the right choices to help the Birdman navigate the scary, difficult world of a grown up dinner party and make sure the night goes off without a hitch!

Featuring:

  • Five pictures of Tony Hawk I ripped from Google!
  • Four new songs by Signposted Disaster!
  • Three different endings (actually more if you're counting different dialogue and not just, like, "good" or "bad")!
  • Two jokes!
  • One royalty-free background I made blurry in Paint.NET!
  • Zero actual moments of skateboarding! (MAY OR MAY NOT BE TRUE)

From the developer of One Nightstand and Having a Fettle with Sebastian Vettel comes another really pointless visual novel that tells you more about its creator than it does about yourself!
